sentences.en: A database framework allows you to equalize them to some extent.
sentences.cn: 数据库框架则使您能够在某种程度上使它们一致.

sentences.en: A small adjustment will equalize the temperature in the two rooms.
sentences.cn: 稍作些调节就会使两间房内的温度相等.

sentences.en: Attempts were made to equalize property.
sentences.cn: 曾多方试图使财产均等.

sentences.en: BTTERY EFFICIENCY. 24 V accessory to equalize cells, extend battery life.
sentences.cn: 电池使用效率:24V附件均衡电池各单体放电率, 延长电池使用寿命.

sentences.en: I ( you ) did not equalize in the opening.
sentences.cn: 开局时我 ( 你 ) 处于劣势.

sentences.en: I do equalize the position in the opening.
sentences.cn: 开局时我和对手势均力敌.

sentences.en: It helps to equalize, and we believe in equality.
sentences.cn: 幽默可以让大家平等, 而我们相信平等.

sentences.en: Let's equalize the duties among all employees in this office.
sentences.cn: 我们办公室中的所有工作人员分担这些责任 吧.

sentences.en: Optional warm - up ports equalize fluid and motor temperatures, preventing thermal shock for dependable cold - weather operation.
sentences.cn: 可选的加温端口补偿流体或马达的温度, 防止冷天运行的热膨胀冲击.

sentences.en: Such measures are needed to equalize wage rates between countries.
sentences.cn: 需要采取这样的措施实现各国工资率的均等。

sentences.en: The conventional blind identification algorithms cannot and equalize time - varying channels well.
sentences.cn: 针对传统的信道盲辨识算法很难适应时变信道模型的问题.

sentences.en: The purpose of the float - bowl vent is to equalize the effects of a clogged air cleaner.
sentences.cn: 浮子室通气孔的效用是补偿空气滤清器阻塞的影响.

sentences.en: This will reduce and equalize mold temperatures.
sentences.cn: 这样会降低和均衡模具温度.

sentences.en: We have tried to equalize the workload between the different teachers.
sentences.cn: 我们力求把工作量平均分配给各位老师。

sentences.en: We need to equalize your body weight before we can pull you out, okay?
sentences.cn: 要用和你重量相等的东西来压在上面,才能把你拖出来, 明白 么 ?

sentences.en: When two beds are connected their levels equalize.
sentences.cn: 当两个床层连通时,它们的床面自行找平.

words.tran_cn: 同样地；相等地，平等地；公平地
对手；匹敌；同辈；相等的事物
补偿器；补偿电路；平衡装置（等于equalizer）
均衡器，[电] 平衡器；平衡装置；使相等的东西
使相等（equalize的过去时和过去分词）
使均衡；使平等；均分；补足（等于equalize）

trans.tran_en: to make two or more things the same in size, value, amount etc

trans.tran_cn: 使相等，补偿，使均衡，打成平局
